name: Elite Combat Sniper
description:
Elite Combat Sniper offer you the immersive and realistic shooting experience. Enemy is just here, Don't hesitate! Load out your weapons, hold your breath, pull the trigger, hit on target and kill all dangerous terrorist

Features:
- Smooth FPS Controls
- Breathtaking music and sound effects
- Free FPS gameplay
- Intense battle scene
- The gun reloads automatically.
- Easy to play, hard to learn
- Tough and challenging missions
